segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and it's a tableau of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water flowing onto the floor is really quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet, just running down the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of all that water damage happening right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor must be soaking, and it's going to warp those cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, completely in her own world, adds to the surreal quality of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression while her foot is in a puddle is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, creating their own perilous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That wobbly stool and the reaching boy make me so nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to end up soaking wet and possibly injured.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all happening simultaneously, a perfect storm of domestic mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish someone would step in and turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess is going to be truly awful to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR
